author: SkinnyTaste
name: Mango Coconut Chia Pudding

ingredients.notes: or monk fruit, sugar/honey to taste

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large container. Mix well and let it sit 30 minutes, then mix again. Refrigerate overnight or at least 5-6 hours, until the seeds expand and thicken. Divide into 2 bowls or glass dishes and serve. Enjoy!
